## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9088a22cb637f620235729c3503e7ab8b9a11fb9469c5742b88fbcfd32be15dd)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'xko2x' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
